control.visible: Control.IsVisible($PARAM[viewid]) + ![container.content(episodes) | container.content(addons) | container.content(artists) | container.content(albums) | container.content(songs) | Container.Content(images) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | container.content(movies) | container.content(TVshows) | container.content(seasons)]
control.label: - $LOCALIZE[1438]

itemlayout.condition: Container.Content() | Container.Content(files) | Container.Content(playlists) | Container.Content(Tags) | Container.Content(Directors) | Container.Content(Years) | Container.Content(Countries) | Container.Content(roles) | [Container.Content(genres) + Window.IsActive(MyVideoNav.xml) + String.IsEmpty(skin.string(moviegenreiconsResource.path))] | [Container.Content(genres) + Window.IsActive(MyMusicNav.xml) + String.IsEmpty(skin.string(musicgenreiconsResource.path))] | [Container.Content(studios) + String.IsEmpty(skin.string(studiosResource.path))]

focusedlayout.condition: Container.Content() | Container.Content(files) | Container.Content(playlists) | Container.Content(Tags) | Container.Content(Directors) | Container.Content(Years) | Container.Content(Countries) | Container.Content(roles) | [Container.Content(genres) + Window.IsActive(MyVideoNav.xml) + String.IsEmpty(skin.string(moviegenreiconsResource.path))] | [Container.Content(genres) + Window.IsActive(MyMusicNav.xml) + String.IsEmpty(skin.string(musicgenreiconsResource.path))] | [Container.Content(studios) + String.IsEmpty(skin.string(studiosResource.path))]

itemlayout.condition: !Skin.HasSetting($PARAM[viewid]_SmallIcons) + ![container.content(episodes) | container.content(addons) | container.content(artists) | container.content(albums) | container.content(songs) | Container.Content(images) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | container.content(movies) | container.content(sets) | container.content(TVshows) | container.content(seasons)]

focusedlayout.condition: !Skin.HasSetting($PARAM[viewid]_SmallIcons) + ![container.content(episodes) | container.content(addons) | container.content(artists) | container.content(albums) | container.content(songs) | Container.Content(images) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | container.content(movies) | container.content(sets) | container.content(TVshows) | container.content(seasons)]

itemlayout.condition: Skin.HasSetting($PARAM[viewid]_SmallIcons) + ![container.content(episodes) | container.content(addons) | container.content(artists) | container.content(albums) | container.content(songs) | Container.Content(images) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | container.content(movies) | container.content(sets) | container.content(TVshows) | container.content(seasons)]

focusedlayout.condition: Skin.HasSetting($PARAM[viewid]_SmallIcons) + ![container.content(episodes) | container.content(addons) | container.content(artists) | container.content(albums) | container.content(songs) | Container.Content(images) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | container.content(movies) | container.content(sets) | container.content(TVshows) | container.content(seasons)]
